questions.question: Considering the overall visual presentation, what is the predominant color scheme of the product label?
Examining the text blocks, what is the most prominently displayed word on the label?
Based on the textual content and its arrangement, what is the primary purpose of the product indicated on the label?
Observing the label's structure, what type of information is presented in a structured list format, such as 'Uses' or 'Warnings'?
Focusing on the textual details, what specific active ingredient is listed as a major component?
From the label's text, what is the recommended frequency of application of the product?
Considering the safety precautions mentioned, what is the flammability status of the product?
According to the label's warnings, what should users avoid when applying this product?
Regarding the inactive components mentioned, what natural oil is listed as an ingredient?
Observing the label's design, what is the font style primarily used throughout the text?
Considering the overall layout, what is the visual style of the label's design?
Based on the text's appearance, what is the case of the lettering used for 'Drug Facts'?
What is the format of the contact information displayed at the bottom?
Focusing on the listed precautions, what kind of ingestion requires immediate medical help?
What is the visual appearance of the lines separating the different sections on the label?
